steps.title: LOL, ROFL, and LMAO all have similar meanings to LLS.
steps.content: LOL, ROFL, and LMAO all have similar meanings to LLS. Texting or messaging â€œLLSâ€ on social media is usually reserved for things you find beyond funny. This makes LLS similar to other slang terms like: LOL (laughing out loud) ROFL (rolling on the floor laughing) LMAO or LMBO (laughing my a** off, or laughing my butt off) CTFU (cracking the f*ck up) Haha, hahaha, or bwahaha

Sending LLS your way!"

steps.content: Love, Light, and Smiles If your friend needs a boost of positivity, text or message them â€œLLS.â€ Sending them love, light, and smiles is a nice gesture that lets them know that youâ€™re by their side and can help them feel optimistic about whatever theyâ€™re going through. â€œSending you LLS today! ğŸ˜˜ Youâ€™re going to ace your test!â€ â€œSpreading LLS on this gray, rainy day!"

steps.title: LifeLine Support
steps.content: LifeLine Support LifeLine Support is a government program that offers discounts for phone, internet, and other communication services. If you work for a communications company, a local assistance program, or the government, you might see â€œLLSâ€ as an abbreviation for this service. [4] X Trustworthy Source Federal Communications Commission Independent U.S. government agency responsible for regulating radio, television, and satellite, and phone communications Go to source

steps.title: Leukemia and Lymphoma Society
steps.content: Leukemia and Lymphoma Society â€œLLSâ€ can also stand for the Leukemia and Lymphoma Society, which offers educational resources and support for people diagnosed with leukemia or lymphoma. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Loyola Law School
steps.content: Loyola Law School â€œLLSâ€ is a common way to shorten Loyola Law School at Loyola Marymount University in California. If you or someone you know goes to the school, you might text or message about it using â€œLLS.â€ [6] X Research source

steps.title: Language Learning Strategies
steps.content: Language Learning Strategies In teaching and education fields, â€œLLSâ€ stands for â€œLanguage Learning Strategies.â€ These are engaging strategies used by teachers to help their students learn a new language easier and faster. [7] X Research source
